name: Estrella
description:
Estrella What is it?

It's a simple typing game where all the terms are related to the astronomy. After you let the Earth be destroyed you can learn something about one of the terms (nothing fancy though ;)). 

I advice you to play the Windows version as for some reason there is a bug in the WebGL version - multiword terms do not wrap into multiple lines. 

How to play it?

The control is pretty simple - you just type the words that are tight to the meteors that are falling down. They say that once every 50 years there is also something special... 

Credits

Video about creation of the game will be sooner or later available on https://www.youtube.com/pitiitnet

All assets created by my 

Sound using:

https://sfxr.me/

Music generated using:

https://soundraw.io/

Oh, and most importantly

If you would like to see the code/assets, everything is here:
